update credit_repayment
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
term_num = #{termNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_principal = #{planPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
handling_charge = #{handlingCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
service_money = #{serviceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plan_service_money = #{planServiceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
third_service_money = #{thirdServiceMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
third_principal = #{thirdPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
third_interest = #{thirdInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plan_interest = #{planInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
diff_value = #{diffValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
start_interest_date = #{startInterestDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
plan_date = #{planDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
real_date = #{realDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
overdue_days = #{overdueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
overdue_interest = #{overdueInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prepayment_date = #{prepaymentDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
prepayment_amount = #{prepaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prepayment_penalty = #{prepaymentPenalty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
biz_status = #{bizStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_borrower_repay = #{isBorrowerRepay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount_repayment = #{amountRepayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
loan_release_batch_no = #{loanReleaseBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prepayment_times = #{prepaymentTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_sn = #{paySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_principal = #{firstPrincipal},
second_principal = #{secondPrincipal},
payment_method = #{paymentMethod},
ident = #{ident},
where credit_repayment_id = #{creditRepaymentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
